text: mn kan talabih aldunya aleajlt, wsea laha whdha, walam ysddiq balakhrt, walam yaemal lha, ejjal allah lah fiha ma yshawh alllh wyrydh mimaa ktbh lah fi allwh almhfwz, thuma yajeal allah lah fi alakhirat jhnm, ydkhlha mlwmana mtrwdana min rahmatih eaza wjl; wdhlk bsbb 'iiradatih aldunya wseyh laha dun alakhrt
